2059150.name: Lost and Hound Soundtrack
2059150.description:
Lost and Hound's soundtrack is upbeat, bouncy and encouraging in nature. It's a bright, energetic take on the Bluegrass genre, famous in the American south.
The music uses acoustic instruments such as mandolin, guitar, banjo, dulcimer, upright bass and occasionally cello. It was all written and recorded by Brian Fairbanks of Daisy Ale Soundworks.
